About Connor T. Godfrey

Connor T. Godfrey is the founder of VMG Business Advisory PLLC, a law practice focused on providing pragmatic corporate counsel to entrepreneurs, investors, funds, and emerging companies. Drawing on years of experience across both the legal and financial sectors, Connor offers business-oriented legal guidance designed to advance clients' strategic goals. Connor holds a J.D. from the University at Buffalo School of Law, where he developed his expertise in corporate law, mergers and acquisitions, and private capital markets. He also holds a B.S. in Finance from the Gabelli School of Business at Fordham University, providing a strong financial foundation that informs his transactional practice. Prior to founding VMG Business Advisory PLLC, Connor accumulated experience across multiple facets of the legal profession — including time at mid-sized corporate law firms and as in-house counsel for a technology company. In addition, his early career included experience as a financial analyst at major banking institutions and asset management firms, giving him valuable insight into the financial drivers that underlie complex corporate transactions. Connor is admitted to practice law in the State of New York and combines legal precision with business fluency to support clients in venture capital financings, fund formation, M&A transactions, corporate governance, securities compliance, and other corporate matters.
